function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential confusion bias in effect estimation due to differences in behavior and adherence levels across various populations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perception of short-term closure led to lack of alternative methods of contact provided by small businesses.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High rates of crowding and inadequate access to water in indigenous communities contribute to the difficulty of practicing social distancing and personal hygiene.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adding non-competent and competent host species in city environments","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher ventilation rates required for occupants’ safety may lead to increased energy use","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent findings in fixed and random parameter models for covid-19 infection rate","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Airflow patterns may contribute to the spread of diseases in occupied volumes.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruptions in the supply chain for construction materials could lead to delays in project completion and impact the health and safety of workers due to prolonged exposure to construction sites.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delayed access to healthcare for vbd patients","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regional variations in epidemic trends within
